name: AFKer
description: Lets you toggle off logout to prevent being sent back to character select after 2 hours of inactivity.

name: Auto-Negotiate
description: Automatically accepts or declines Trade Broker negotiations.

name: Auto-Vanguard
description: Automatically turns in Vanguard quests upon completion.

name: Instant Everything
description: Removes the animations for: Enchant, Upgrade, Soulbind, Merge, Dismantle.

name: Loot
description: Automatically loots items near your character.

name: No Mote Cancel
description: Reverts Mystic motes to the old style of casting where moving will not cancel the skill.

name: Quick Load
description: Removes useless loading screen when switching channels or teleporting nearby.

name: Rootbeer
description: Automatically opens Bamarama Boxes and deletes unwanted items.

name: Skill Prediction
description: Simulates skills client-side, eliminating ping-based delays and animation lock.

name: Slay
description: Triggers fall damage to lower your HP to the specified %.

name: FPS Utils
description: Lets you hide players, NPCs, and effects to improve FPS.
